post.title: htc desire flash, battery, speech to text questions
post.content: just got a htc desire yesterday and have the a few questions. 1. what do i have to do or install to get flash working. the went to a few web sites and didn't see a difference compared to going to those same sites with the nexus. will i only need to use to stock browser 2. will nexus battery work in the desire. they are the same size put have a different number after the dash on the part number. i have an extra battery for the nexus that i plan in keeping after selling it. 3. how to get speech to text working with the htcime keyboard. got it working with the x 10, but nothing happens when pushing the button.
